text: Madina tul Hajjaj station tag Madina-Tul-Hijjaj railway station (Urdu and ) is located in Madina-Tul-Hijjaj, Rawalpindi city, Rawalpindi district of Punjab province, Pakistan. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Islamabad Capital Territory
title: Madina-Tul-Hijjaj railway station
